item.title: Script Update Open_webui Lxc
item.description: A really simple script for those that for some odd reason decided to run the Open WebUI server from inside a LXC. Introduction I really like the interface in Proxmox and i prefer it than dealing with Portainer for some services that are more accessed. This is the case for Open WebUI, which I use daily. The problem I faced was to understand how the service works under the hood. In Proxmox we can use the Proxmox VE Community Scripts which are really handy, but they don’t have much documentation on how the scripts work.
